description:
Say goodbye to weeds

Eliminate unwanted vegetation quickly with our convenient ready-to-use formula.

Weed Warrior Spot Treatment delivers our powerful organic herbicidal soap in a convenient spray bottle format - no mixing required. This fast-acting, non-selective formula kills weeds, grasses, moss and algae in as little as 20 minutes. Its non-staining formula is perfect for use in flower beds, near patios, along sidewalks, and in mulched areas.

sections.product_features:
Ready-to-use organic weed killer spray
Kills all vegetation including weeds and grasses
OMRI-listed for organic gardening
See results in as little as 20 minutes
Non-staining formula
Non-selective - use carefully around desired plants
Perfect for hardscapes and garden beds
sections.whats_included: Two 32 oz. spray bottles of organic herbicidal soap weed killer. Covers up to 100 sq. ft. of weeds.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply between 50-85 degrees F when no rain is expected for 3+ hours:
Shake bottle well before using
Adjust nozzle to desired spray pattern
Spray directly onto weed leaves until thoroughly covered
Allow to dry completely before any foot or pet traffic
Repeat treatment in 2-3 weeks for tough weeds if needed
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How does this organic weed killer work?
Weed Warrior is a powerful herbicidal soap made from fatty acids. It eats away at the waxy coating that protects most green leafy growth from the elements, causing rapid desiccation and plant death.
What's the difference between this and the concentrate version?
This is a ready-to-use formula in convenient spray bottles - no mixing required. It's perfect for spot-treating individual weeds or small areas. The concentrate version is more economical for treating larger areas but requires mixing with water and using a sprayer system.
Can I use this on my lawn?
It depends. Weed Warrior is non-selective, meaning it will kill any vegetation it contacts - including grass. We recommend using it in flower beds, patios, sidewalks, and mulched areas. If you need to control weeds in your lawn, use Weed Warrior carefully and patch any affected grass as needed. Or use Dandelion Doom which is formulated to kill weeds without harming grass!
What vegetation does Weed Warrior control?
Effective against bluegrass, chickweed, crabgrass, corn spurry, dandelion, groundsel, lambsquarters, mouse-eared chickweed, mustards, plantain, redroot pigweed, round leaved mallow, sheep sorrel, shepherd's-purse, stinkweed, thistle, moss, algae, and lichens.
When will I see results?
Fully drenched weeds will dry up in as little as 20 minutes or up to 24 hours, depending on the size and maturity of the plant you are spraying.
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states.
